balance_payment_ratio.title: balance to minimum payment ratio
balance_payment_ratio.description: Attempts to find debts that will be easy to pay off and add quickly to your snowball.
balance_payment_ratio.evaluation: This is a preferred strategy as it can be mentally and emotionally easier than the Highest Interest Rate strategy and usually quicker than the Lowest Balance strategy.

balance_rate_ratio.title: balance to interest rate ratio
balance_rate_ratio.description: Attempts to find debts that will be easy to pay off and add quickly to your snowball.
balance_rate_ratio.evaluation: This is a preferred strategy as if can be mentally and emotionally easier than the Highest Interest Rate strategy and quicker than the Lowest Balance strategy.

highest_balance.title: highest balance first
highest_balance.description: Pay off the highest balance first.
highest_balance.evaluation: This is calculated as a counter-point to the Lowest Balance strategy to show how much of a difference the order of repayment makes.

highest_interest.title: highest interest first
highest_interest.description: By paying off the loans with the highest interest rate first you end up paying less in interest in total.
highest_interest.evaluation: This will save the most money, but may be the most mentally and emotionally challenging to execute since it usually takes longer to feel like it is having any effect.

lowest_balance.title: lowest balance first
lowest_balance.description: By paying off loans with the lowest balance first you can increase your snowball quickly.
lowest_balance.evaluation: This is one of the most commonly promoted strategies and often is easier mentally and emotionally to execute since you are able to build momentum quickly and feel good about the progress you make.

lowest_rate.title: lowest interest rate first
lowest_rate.description: Pay off the lowest interest rate first.
lowest_rate.evaluation: This is calculated as a counter-point to the Highest Interest Rate strategy to show how much of a difference the order of repayment makes.

save.label: Save for later
save.help: Stores the debt and repayment information locally for your next visit.
